newsitem.title: THAILAND: Total Access sees 1996 profit growth.
newsitem.headline: Total Access sees 1996 profit growth.

text.p: Thai mobile phone operator Total Access Communication Plc said on Wednesday that the company expected to post a 36 percent growth in 1996 net profit from the 1.9 billion baht recorded in 1995.
"According to our unaudited figures, the profit in 1996 is expected to grow by 36 pct compared with 1.9 bln in 1995," the firm's senior vice-president, Premon Pinskul, told Reuters.
"The profit growth is in line with our earlier projections," he added.
However, he said that the company's profit margins for 1997 would be smaller as new competitors entered the market.
He said the company's financial results for 1996 had so far not been formally submitted to the Singapore stock exchange where the firm is listed.
